m_szDocTitle: Blaze new trails by thinking...electric! | Press Releases | Asia | Sustainable Business
m_szDocSumamry: Friday 29 April 2016 Share It was only a few years ago that the thought of charging a car overnight in your garage was unimaginable. Fast forward, and the increasing popularity of electric vehicles combined with reduced solar PV costs are making a future of EVs a reality. Tesla Motors unveiled the prototype of its Tesla Model 3 last month, the latest in its range of electric cars, which it says will “accelerate” the global drive for sustainable transport, whilst Simon Hackett, Executive Chairman, Redflow, can now charge his Tesla Model S with solar power stored by his Redflow Large Scale Batte
